verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> Moreover the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> and you בֶן־ <WH1121> Also thou son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> of man כֹּה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> thus saith אֲדֹנָ֧י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֛ה <WH3069> GOD לְאַדְמַ֥ת <WH127> unto the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel קֵ֑ץ <WH7093> An end בָּ֣א <WH935> is come הַקֵּ֔ץ <WH7093> the end עַל־ <WH5921> and [אַרְבַּעַת כ] (אַרְבַּ֖ע <WH702> four ק) כַּנְפ֥וֹת <WH3671> corners הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the land

עַתָּה֙ <WH6258> Now הַקֵּ֣ץ <WH7093> Now [is] the end עָלַ֔יִךְ <WH5921> and I וְשִׁלַּחְתִּ֤י <WH7971> [come] upon thee and I will send אַפִּי֙ <WH639> mine anger בָּ֔ךְ וּשְׁפַטְתִּ֖יךְ <WH8199> upon thee and will judge כִּדְרָכָ֑יִךְ <WH1870> thee according to thy ways וְנָתַתִּ֣י <WH5414> and will recompense עָלַ֔יִךְ <WH5921> and אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all תּוֹעֲבֹתָֽיִךְ׃ <WH8441> upon thee all thine abominations

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> no תָח֥וֹס <WH2347> shall not spare עֵינִ֛י <WH5869> And mine eye עָלַ֖יִךְ <WH5921> on וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor אֶחְמ֑וֹל <WH2550> thee neither will I have pity כִּ֣י <WH3588> for דְרָכַ֜יִךְ <WH1870> thy ways עָלַ֣יִךְ <WH5921> and אֶתֵּ֗ן <WH5414> but I will recompense וְתוֹעֲבוֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH8441> upon thee and thine abominations בְּתוֹכֵ֣ךְ <WH8432> shall be in the midst תִּֽהְיֶ֔יןָ <WH1961> become וִידַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH3045> of thee and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD פ

כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3068> GOD רָעָ֛ה <WH7451> An evil אַחַ֥ת <WH259> an only רָעָ֖ה <WH7451> evil הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold בָאָֽה׃ <WH935> behold is come

קֵ֣ץ <WH7093> An end בָּ֔א <WH935> is come בָּ֥א <WH935> is come הַקֵּ֖ץ <WH7093> the end הֵקִ֣יץ <WH6974> it watcheth אֵלָ֑יִךְ <WH413> against הִנֵּ֖ה <WH2009> behold בָּאָֽה׃ <WH935> for thee behold it is come

בָּ֧אָה <WH935> is come הַצְּפִירָ֛ה <WH6843> The morning אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> to you יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> unto thee O thou that dwellest הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> in the land בָּ֣א <WH935> has come הָעֵ֗ת <WH6256> the time קָר֛וֹב <WH7138> [is] near הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> the day מְהוּמָ֖ה <WH4103> of trouble וְלֹא־ <WH3808> rather הֵ֥ד <WH1906> and not the sounding again הָרִֽים׃ <WH2022> of the mountains

עַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> Now מִקָּר֗וֹב <WH7138> Now will I shortly אֶשְׁפּ֤וֹךְ <WH8210> pour out חֲמָתִי֙ <WH2534> my fury עָלַ֔יִךְ <WH5921> on וְכִלֵּיתִ֤י <WH3615> upon thee and accomplish אַפִּי֙ <WH639> mine anger בָּ֔ךְ וּשְׁפַטְתִּ֖יךְ <WH8199> upon thee and I will judge כִּדְרָכָ֑יִךְ <WH1870> thee according to thy ways וְנָתַתִּ֣י <WH5414> and will recompense עָלַ֔יִךְ <WH5921> and אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all תּוֹעֲבוֹתָֽיִךְ׃ <WH8441> thee for all thine abominations

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> no תָח֥וֹס <WH2347> shall not spare עֵינִ֖י <WH5869> And mine eye וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor אֶחְמ֑וֹל <WH2550> neither will I have pity כִּדְרָכַ֜יִךְ <WH1870> thee according to thy ways עָלַ֣יִךְ <WH5921> and אֶתֵּ֗ן <WH5414> I will recompense וְתוֹעֲבוֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH8441> and thine abominations בְּתוֹכֵ֣ךְ <WH8432> [that] are in the midst תִּֽהְיֶ֔יןָ <WH1961> become וִֽידַעְתֶּ֕ם <WH3045> of thee and ye shall know כִּ֛י <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD מַכֶּֽה׃ <WH5221> that smiteth

הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> Behold the day הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold בָאָ֑ה <WH935> behold it is come יָֽצְאָה֙ <WH3318> is gone forth הַצְּפִרָ֔ה <WH6843> the morning צָ֚ץ <WH6692> hath blossomed הַמַּטֶּ֔ה <WH4294> the rod פָּרַ֖ח <WH6524> hath budded הַזָּדֽוֹן׃ <WH2087> pride

הֶחָמָ֥ס ׀ <WH2555> Violence קָ֖ם <WH6965> is risen up לְמַטֵּה־ <WH4294> into a rod רֶ֑שַׁע <WH7562> of wickedness לֹא־ <WH3808> None מֵהֶ֞ם <WH1992> like וְלֹ֧א <WH3808> of them none מֵהֲמוֹנָ֛ם <WH1995> none of them [shall remain] nor of their multitude וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> none מֶהֱמֵהֶ֖ם <WH1991> nor of any וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor נֹ֥הַּ <WH5089> of theirs neither [shall there be] wailing בָּהֶֽם׃

בָּ֤א <WH935> is come הָעֵת֙ <WH6256> The time הִגִּ֣יעַ <WH5060> draweth near הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> the day הַקּוֹנֶה֙ <WH7069> let not the buyer אַל־ <WH408> nor יִשְׂמָ֔ח <WH8055> rejoice וְהַמּוֹכֵ֖ר <WH4376> nor the seller אַל־ <WH408> nor יִתְאַבָּ֑ל <WH56> mourn כִּ֥י <WH3588> for חָר֖וֹן <WH2740> for wrath אֶל־ <WH413> is against כָּל־ <WH3605> all הֲמוֹנָֽהּ׃ <WH1995> [is] upon all the multitude

כִּ֣י <WH3588> Indeed הַמּוֹכֵ֗ר <WH4376> For the seller אֶל־ <WH413> regarding הַמִּמְכָּר֙ <WH4465> to that which is sold לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יָשׁ֔וּב <WH7725> shall not return וְע֥וֹד <WH5750> long בַּחַיִּ֖ים <WH2416> although they were yet alive חַיָּתָ֑ם <WH2416> of his life כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Indeed חָז֤וֹן <WH2377> for the vision אֶל־ <WH413> regarding כָּל־ <WH3605> all הֲמוֹנָהּ֙ <WH1995> [is] touching the whole multitude לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יָשׁ֔וּב <WH7725> thereof [which] shall not return וְאִ֧ישׁ <WH376> neither shall any בַּעֲוֹנ֛וֹ <WH5771> himself in the iniquity חַיָּת֖וֹ <WH2416> age לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor יִתְחַזָּֽקוּ׃ <WH2388> strengthen

תָּקְע֤וּ <WH8628> They have blown בַתָּק֙וֹעַ֙ <WH8619> the trumpet וְהָכִ֣ין <WH3559> even to make all ready הַכֹּ֔ל <WH3605> everything וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> no הֹלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> but none goeth לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> to the battle כִּ֥י <WH3588> for חֲרוֹנִ֖י <WH2740> for my wrath אֶל־ <WH413> is against כָּל־ <WH3605> all הֲמוֹנָֽהּ׃ <WH1995> [is] upon all the multitude

הַחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> The sword בַּח֔וּץ <WH2351> [is] without וְהַדֶּ֥בֶר <WH1698> and the pestilence וְהָרָעָ֖ב <WH7458> and the famine מִבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> within אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who בַּשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> he that [is] in the field בַּחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> with the sword יָמ֔וּת <WH4191> shall die וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who בָּעִ֔יר <WH5892> and he that [is] in the city רָעָ֥ב <WH7458> famine וָדֶ֖בֶר <WH1698> and pestilence יֹאכֲלֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH398> shall devour

וּפָֽלְטוּ֙ <WH6403> But they that escape פְּלִ֣יטֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6412> of them shall escape וְהָי֣וּ <WH1961> become אֶל־ <WH413> on הֶהָרִ֗ים <WH2022> and shall be on the mountains כְּיוֹנֵ֧י <WH3123> like doves הַגֵּאָי֛וֹת <WH1516> of the valleys כֻּלָּ֖ם <WH3605> all הֹמ֑וֹת <WH1993> all of them mourning אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> every one בַּעֲוֹנֽוֹ׃ <WH5771> for his iniquity

כָּל־ <WH3605> All הַיָּדַ֖יִם <WH3027> All hands תִּרְפֶּ֑ינָה <WH7503> shall be feeble וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all בִּרְכַּ֖יִם <WH1290> and all knees תֵּלַ֥כְנָה <WH1980> will become מָּֽיִם׃ <WH4325> [as] water

וְחָגְר֣וּ <WH2296> They shall also gird שַׂקִּ֔ים <WH8242> [themselves] with sackcloth וְכִסְּתָ֥ה <WH3680> shall cover אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> פַּלָּצ֑וּת <WH6427> and horror וְאֶ֤ל <WH413> on כָּל־ <WH3605> all פָּנִים֙ <WH6440> [shall be] upon all faces בּוּשָׁ֔ה <WH955> them and shame וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all רָאשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <WH7218> upon all their heads קָרְחָֽה׃ <WH7144> and baldness

כַּסְפָּ֞ם <WH3701> their silver בַּחוּצ֣וֹת <WH2351> in the streets יַשְׁלִ֗יכוּ <WH7993> They shall cast וּזְהָבָם֮ <WH2091> and their gold לְנִדָּ֣ה <WH5079> shall be removed יִֽהְיֶה֒ <WH1961> will become כַּסְפָּ֨ם <WH3701> their silver וּזְהָבָ֜ם <WH2091> and their gold לֹֽא־ <WH3808> cannot יוּכַ֣ל <WH3201> shall not be able לְהַצִּילָ֗ם <WH5337> to deliver בְּיוֹם֙ <WH3117> them in the day עֶבְרַ֣ת <WH5678> of the wrath יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD נַפְשָׁם֙ <WH5315> their souls לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יְשַׂבֵּ֔עוּ <WH7646> they shall not satisfy וּמֵעֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4578> their bowels לֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot יְמַלֵּ֑אוּ <WH4390> neither fill כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מִכְשׁ֥וֹל <WH4383> because it is the stumblingblock עֲוֹנָ֖ם <WH5771> of their iniquity הָיָֽה׃ <WH1961> has become

וּצְבִ֤י <WH6643> As for the beauty עֶדְיוֹ֙ <WH5716> of his ornament לְגָא֣וֹן <WH1347> it in majesty שָׂמָ֔הוּ <WH7760> he set וְצַלְמֵ֧י <WH6754> the images תוֹעֲבֹתָ֛ם <WH8441> of their abominations שִׁקּוּצֵיהֶ֖ם <WH8251> [and] of their detestable things עָ֣שׂוּ <WH6213> but they made ב֑וֹ עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֛ן <WH3651> after that נְתַתִּ֥יו <WH5414> therein therefore have I set לָהֶ֖ם לְנִדָּֽה׃ <WH5079> it far

וּנְתַתִּ֤יו <WH5414> And I will give בְּיַֽד־ <WH3027> it into the hands הַזָּרִים֙ <WH2114> of the strangers לָבַ֔ז <WH957> for a prey וּלְרִשְׁעֵ֥י <WH7563> and to the wicked הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the earth לְשָׁלָ֑ל <WH7998> for a spoil [וְחִלְּלֻהָ כ] (וְחִלְּלֽוּהוּ׃ <WH2490> begin ק)

וַהֲסִבּוֹתִ֤י <WH5437> will I turn פָנַי֙ <WH6440> My face מֵהֶ֔ם <WH1992> and they וְחִלְּל֖וּ <WH2490> also from them and they shall pollute אֶת־ <WH853> צְפוּנִ֑י <WH6845> my secret וּבָאוּ־ <WH935> shall enter בָ֥הּ פָּרִיצִ֖ים <WH6530> [place] for the robbers וְחִלְּלֽוּהָ׃ <WH2490> into it and defile פ

עֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH6213> Make הָֽרַתּ֑וֹק <WH7569> a chain כִּ֣י <WH3588> for הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> for the land מָֽלְאָה֙ <WH4390> is full מִשְׁפַּ֣ט <WH4941> crimes דָּמִ֔ים <WH1818> of bloody וְהָעִ֖יר <WH5892> and the city מָלְאָ֥ה <WH4390> is full חָמָֽס׃ <WH2555> of violence

וְהֵֽבֵאתִי֙ <WH935> Wherefore I will bring רָעֵ֣י <WH7451> the worst גוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> of the heathen וְיָרְשׁ֖וּ <WH3423> and they shall possess אֶת־ <WH853> בָּֽתֵּיהֶ֑ם <WH1004> their houses וְהִשְׁבַּתִּי֙ <WH7673> to cease גְּא֣וֹן <WH1347> I will also make the pomp עַזִּ֔ים <WH5794> of the strong וְנִחֲל֖וּ <WH2490> will be profaned מְקַֽדְשֵׁיהֶֽם׃ <WH6942> and their holy places
קְפָ֖דָה־ <WH7089> Destruction בָ֑א <WH935> cometh וּבִקְשׁ֥וּ <WH1245> and they shall seek שָׁל֖וֹם <WH7965> peace וָאָֽיִן׃ <WH369> there

הֹוָ֤ה <WH1943> Mischief עַל־ <WH5921> upon הֹוָה֙ <WH1943> upon mischief תָּב֔וֹא <WH935> shall come וּשְׁמֻעָ֥ה <WH8052> and rumour אֶל־ <WH413> will be upon שְׁמוּעָ֖ה <WH8052> shall be upon rumour תִּֽהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> become וּבִקְשׁ֤וּ <WH1245> then shall they seek חָזוֹן֙ <WH2377> a vision מִנָּבִ֔יא <WH5030> of the prophet וְתוֹרָה֙ <WH8451> but the law תֹּאבַ֣ד <WH6> shall perish מִכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> from the priest וְעֵצָ֖ה <WH6098> and counsel מִזְּקֵנִֽים׃ <WH2205> from the ancients

הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> The king יִתְאַבָּ֗ל <WH56> shall mourn וְנָשִׂיא֙ <WH5387> and the prince יִלְבַּ֣שׁ <WH3847> shall be clothed שְׁמָמָ֔ה <WH8077> with desolation וִידֵ֥י <WH3027> and the hands עַם־ <WH5971> of the people הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the land תִּבָּהַ֑לְנָה <WH926> shall be troubled מִדַּרְכָּ֞ם <WH1870> unto them after their way אֶעֱשֶׂ֤ה <WH6213> I will do אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> וּבְמִשְׁפְּטֵיהֶ֣ם <WH4941> and according to their deserts אֶשְׁפְּטֵ֔ם <WH8199> will I judge וְיָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> them and they shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD פ
